dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev just dropped a pretty strong statement at the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev just dropped a pretty strong statement at the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is speaking at the Astana International Forum (AIF).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, he was talking about prioritizing dialogue over division, right? That's a bold stance in today's world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, he was talking about prioritizing dialogue over division, right? That's a bold stance in today's world.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our foreign policy is based on prioritizing dialogue over division and respecting sovereign rights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he really emphasized, like, respecting sovereign rights and rejecting nationalistic arrogance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he really emphasized, like, respecting sovereign rights and rejecting nationalistic arrogance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our foreign policy is based on prioritizing dialogue over division and respecting sovereign rights. Nationalistic arrogance and disregard for the historical and cultural traditions of peoples are unacceptable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is interesting because the forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future—that's this year's theme.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is interesting because the forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future-that's this year's theme.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The theme of the forum is: Connecting Minds, Shaping the Future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's happening May 29th to 30th, 2025—so still a ways off, but the messaging is already strong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's happening May twenty ninth to thirtieth, twenty twenty five-so still a ways off, but the messaging is already strong.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is taking place on May 29"30, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, unity in diversity—that's a principle they're really pushing in Kazakhstan, especially for minority languages and cultures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, unity in diversity-that's a principle they're really pushing in Kazakhstan, especially for minority languages and cultures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same time, it is essential to respect the right of all national minorities to speak their languages and develop their cultures. That is why in Kazakhstan we firmly uphold the principle of ˜unity in diversity', said the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's uh, definitely a contrast to some of the more divisive rhetoric we hear elsewhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's uh, definitely a contrast to some of the more divisive rhetoric we hear elsewhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the forum's not just governments—it's companies, academics, international orgs… all talking global issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the forum's not just governments-it's companies, academics, international orgs... all talking global issues.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is a platform for dialogue among representatives of governments, international organizations, major companies, and academia to discuss the most pressing global issues"from the economy and security to ecology and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: From economy to climate, yeah. It's a pretty comprehensive platform.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From economy to climate, yeah. It's a pretty comprehensive platform.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is a platform for dialogue among representatives of governments, international organizations, major companies, and academia to discuss the most pressing global issues"from the economy and security to ecology and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think other leaders will adopt that kind of cooperative language?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think other leaders will adopt that kind of cooperative language?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say, but it's refreshing to hear someone stress constructive cooperation so clearly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hard to say, but it's refreshing to hear someone stress constructive cooperation so clearly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan views the modern turbulent world through the lens of constructive cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the fact that they're live streaming the plenary session makes it accessible too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the fact that they're live streaming the plenary session makes it accessible too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The live stream of the forum's plenary session can be viewed in the video below.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder if forums like this can actually shift how nations interact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder if forums like this can actually shift how nations interact.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's a start. Dialogue over division—simple but powerful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's a start. Dialogue over division-simple but powerful.
